File List

Here is a list of all files with brief descriptions:
AbstractOctree.h [code]Octree structure for collision detection the user must impliment the pure virtual checkCollisionOnNode method for appropriate collision also the templated class must have a getPosition method that returns a vector of the correct template type and a getRadius method to return a bounding radius of the object as a float may update this to do bounding radius or bounding box at some stage
AbstractRK4Integrator.cpp [code]Abstract Rk4 integrator to caculate the state of mass particles by runge-kutte method
AbstractRK4Integrator.h [code]
Cloth.cpp [code]Class creating and updating the cloth
Cloth.h [code]This class creates the cloth based on the mass-spring model
ClothParticle.cpp [code]Class that create the Cloth's mass Particles. the state of particles is updated via the RK4 integrator
ClothParticle.h [code]This class contains the cloth mass particles
ClothSpring.cpp [code]Class that create the Cloth's springs and calculates the internal spring forces
ClothSpring.h [code]
GLWindow.cpp [code]Class for main drawing operations and it integrates all the member classes for the simulation
GLWindow.h [code]Basic Qt GL window class where all the drawing and updating of objects takes place
main.cpp [code]
MainWindow.cpp [code]Main class for user interface and input output operations
MainWindow.h [code]
ParticleOctree.cpp [code]
ParticleOctree.h [code]
Props.cpp [code]His class contains all meshes required in the simulation using this class, we load meshes once which can be attached to objects in simulation
Props.h [code]This class imports all the meshes used in the simulation for collisions
